channel.title: MicroConf 2018 - going?
channel.description:
I got my tickets a couple of days ago, at great expense to the management. Actually, the tickets are just a small part of the $$$ - I'm travelling from Sydney, Australia so my total ~~cost~~ **investment** will be well north of USD 10k (costs plus lost income) but ... it's time! I am launching [tvCAD](https://www.tvcad.tv/) & [CAD replace](https://www.cadreplace.com/) on May 13 and I have until the end of next year, when my youngest ankle-biter starts school, to sort out where we will live, my freelance routine etc. for the duration of their school lives. Yah, it's time.
There are a couple of threads over at Indie Hackers on who is going with lots of resources too.
- https://www.indiehackers.com/forum/microconf-2018-whos-going-ffdc567a8a - https://www.indiehackers.com/forum/whos-coming-to-microconf-this-year-b619bba462
and @mijustin has a [Google sheet of attendees](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1FgPamAK6dGYNOE5hbBETO2UHk4s6EhtWOo2hk-Mh_2Y/edit#gid=0) and a great [Tips and Guide](https://justinjackson.ca/microconf/) post. He is MC-ing the Starter Edition. I dunno, he's so shy ;)
I plan on arriving a couple of days early to unjetlag and hopefully meet a few of us and/or see the big ditch again (I will book flights in the 1st week of April). I am going to both conferences because it's on the other side of the world so why not? I may also do a side-trip or 2 in the USA if I jag a lucrative meetup or interesting broadcast facility tour because other side of the world.
You going?

item.title: MicroConf 2018 - going?
item.dc:creator: LostMahbles
item.description:
That is the most apt way of putting it, for sure.

item.title: MicroConf 2018 - going?
item.dc:creator: Gorby
item.description:
Yes, off to the starter edition. You and I have tweeted though. (Fat old English bloke ).

I’m rather knowledgable of interesting broadcast facilities too. I’ll ping you an email sometime later.

Read full topic

item.title: MicroConf 2018 - going?

item.description:
I got my tickets a couple of days ago, at great expense to the management. Actually, the tickets are just a small part of the $$$ - I’m travelling from Sydney, Australia so my total cost investment will be well north of USD 10k (costs plus lost income) but … it’s time! I plan on arriving a couple of days early to unjetlag and hopefully meet a few of us and/or see the big ditch again (I will book flights in the 1st week of April). I am going to both conferences because it’s on the other side of the world so why not? I may also do a side-trip or 2 in the USA if I jag a lucrative meetup or interesting broadcast facility tour because other side of the world.
